mapper.select: select category.cgid,commodity.cid,commodity.sid,commodity.logo,price,productname,salesvolu,bid,city,shop.logo as shoplogo,saddress,shopname,city.cityname from commodity,shop,category,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid and shop.city=city.cid and commodity.cgid=category.cgid and big='${big}'

select category.cgid,commodity.cid,commodity.sid,commodity.logo,price,productname,salesvolu,bid,city,shop.logo as shoplogo,saddress,shopname,city.cityname from commodity,shop,category,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid and commodity.cgid=category.cgid and shop.city=city.cid and big='${big}'and small='${small}'

select cgid,commodity.cid,commodity.sid,commodity.logo,price,productname,salesvolu,bid,city,shop.logo as shoplogo,saddress,shopname,city.cityname from commodity,shop,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid AND shop.city=city.cid and cgid='${cgid}'
select count(*) from commodity,shop,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid AND shop.city=city.cid and cgid='${cgid}'

select cgid,commodity.cid,commodity.sid,commodity.logo,price,productname,salesvolu,bid,city,shop.logo as shoplogo,saddress,shopname,city.cityname from commodity,shop,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid AND city=city.cid and cgid='${page.cgid}' LIMIT ${page.start},${page.count}
select count(*) from commodity,shop,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid AND shop.city=city.cid AND productname like '%${productname}%'

select cgid,commodity.cid,commodity.sid,commodity.logo,price,productname,salesvolu,bid,city,shop.logo as shoplogo,saddress,shopname,city.cityname from commodity,shop,city where commodity.sid=shop.sid AND city=city.cid AND productname like '%${page.productname}%' LIMIT ${page.start},${page.count}
